name: blueberry ribbed waffle socks
notes:
from the designer's notes:

> "these are a good in-between weight for wearing around the house and under boots. the ribbed waffle pattern helps the socks stay up quite well, and because of the stretch, they will fit a woman's medium to a man's medium foot without trouble."

there are variations available to change the gauge of the pattern. i've made the socks in several different weights from fingering to worsted weight. 

listed as "[ribbed waffle socks knitting pattern][1]" on the knitting on the net website.

previously available at knitlist: http://web.archive.org/web/20080324044632/http://www.knitlist.com/98gift/blueberrysocks.htm


  [1]: http://www.knittingonthenet.com/patterns/sockswaffle.htm
